description: Application to clear condition 8 (Wildlife and Nesting features) of approved application DM2023/01522.
site_name: All Saints Benhilton Church Of England Primary School
decision_conditions: Prior to occupation of this development hereby permitted, a scheme for wildlife and nesting features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. These will include at least:-2 x house sparrow terraces-2 x starling boxFull details should be provided of the feature's location, height and distance from any external lighting (which if located too close, could prevent them from being successfully used), in plan and elevation views.Reason: To enhance the biodiversity value of the land in accordance with Policy 26 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018
